00079 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00080 /* permanent tagging code */
00081 #define PERMINENT_CB_ID "_bpy_persistent"
00082 
00083 static PyObject *bpy_app_handlers_persistent_new(PyTypeObject *UNUSED(type), PyObject *args, PyObject *UNUSED(kwds))
00084 {
00085     PyObject *value;
00086 
00087     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "O:bpy.app.handlers.persistent", &value))
00088         return NULL;
00089 
00090     if (PyFunction_Check(value)) {
00091         PyObject **dict_ptr = _PyObject_GetDictPtr(value);
00092         if (dict_ptr == NULL) {
00093             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00094                             "bpy.app.handlers.persistent wasn't able to "
00095                             "get the dictionary from the function passed");
00096             return NULL;
00097         }
00098         else {
00099             /* set id */
00100             if (*dict_ptr == NULL) {
00101                 *dict_ptr = PyDict_New();
00102             }
00103 
00104             PyDict_SetItemString(*dict_ptr, PERMINENT_CB_ID, Py_None);
00105         }
00106 
00107         Py_INCREF(value);
00108         return value;
00109     }
00110     else {
00111         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00112                         "bpy.app.handlers.persistent expected a function");
00113         return NULL;
00114     }
00115 }

00167 
00168 static PyObject *py_cb_array[BLI_CB_EVT_TOT] = {NULL};
00169 
00170 static PyObject *make_app_cb_info(void)
00171 {
00172     PyObject *app_cb_info;
00173     int pos = 0;
00174 
00175     app_cb_info = PyStructSequence_New(&BlenderAppCbType);
00176     if (app_cb_info == NULL) {
00177         return NULL;
00178     }
00179 
00180     for (pos = 0; pos < BLI_CB_EVT_TOT; pos++) {
00181         if (app_cb_info_fields[pos].name == NULL) {
00182             Py_FatalError("invalid callback slots 1");
00183         }
00184         PyStructSequence_SET_ITEM(app_cb_info, pos, (py_cb_array[pos] = PyList_New(0)));
00185     }
00186     if (app_cb_info_fields[pos + APP_CB_OTHER_FIELDS].name != NULL) {
00187         Py_FatalError("invalid callback slots 2");
00188     }
00189 
00190     /* custom function */
00191     PyStructSequence_SET_ITEM(app_cb_info, pos++, (PyObject *)&BPyPersistent_Type);
00192 
00193     return app_cb_info;
00194 }
00195 
00196 PyObject *BPY_app_handlers_struct(void)
00197 {
00198     PyObject *ret;
00199 
00200 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(FREE_WINDOWS)
00201     BPyPersistent_Type.ob_base.ob_base.ob_type = &PyType_Type;
00202 #endif
00203 
00204     if (PyType_Ready(&BPyPersistent_Type) < 0) {
00205         BLI_assert(!"error initializing 'bpy.app.handlers.persistent'");
00206     }
00207 
00208     PyStructSequence_InitType(&BlenderAppCbType, &app_cb_info_desc);
00209 
00210     ret = make_app_cb_info();
00211 
00212     /* prevent user from creating new instances */
00213     BlenderAppCbType.tp_init = NULL;
00214     BlenderAppCbType.tp_new = NULL;
00215     BlenderAppCbType.tp_hash = (hashfunc)_Py_HashPointer; /* without this we can't do set(sys.modules) [#29635] */
00216 
00217     /* assign the C callbacks */
00218     if (ret) {
00219         static bCallbackFuncStore funcstore_array[BLI_CB_EVT_TOT] = {{NULL}};
00220         bCallbackFuncStore *funcstore;
00221         int pos = 0;
00222 
00223         for (pos = 0; pos < BLI_CB_EVT_TOT; pos++) {
00224             funcstore = &funcstore_array[pos];
00225             funcstore->func = bpy_app_generic_callback;
00226             funcstore->alloc = 0;
00227             funcstore->arg = SET_INT_IN_POINTER(pos);
00228             BLI_add_cb(funcstore, pos);
00229         }
00230     }
00231 
00232     return ret;
00233 }
00234 
00235 void BPY_app_handlers_reset(const short do_all)
00236 {
00237     int pos = 0;
00238 
00239     if (do_all) {
00240         for (pos = 0; pos < BLI_CB_EVT_TOT; pos++) {
00241             /* clear list */
00242             PyList_SetSlice(py_cb_array[pos], 0, PY_SSIZE_T_MAX, NULL);
00243         }
00244     }
00245     else {
00246         /* save string conversion thrashing */
00247         PyObject *perm_id_str = PyUnicode_FromString(PERMINENT_CB_ID);
00248 
00249         for (pos = 0; pos < BLI_CB_EVT_TOT; pos++) {
00250             /* clear only items without PERMINENT_CB_ID */
00251             PyObject *ls = py_cb_array[pos];
00252             Py_ssize_t i;
00253 
00254             PyObject *item;
00255             PyObject **dict_ptr;
00256 
00257             for (i = PyList_GET_SIZE(ls) - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00258 
00259                 if ((PyFunction_Check((item = PyList_GET_ITEM(ls, i)))) &&
00260                     (dict_ptr = _PyObject_GetDictPtr(item)) &&
00261                     (*dict_ptr) &&
00262                     (PyDict_GetItem(*dict_ptr, perm_id_str) != NULL))
00263                 {
00264                     /* keep */
00265                 }
00266                 else {
00267                     /* remove */
00268                     /* PySequence_DelItem(ls, i); */ /* more obvious buw slower */
00269                     PyList_SetSlice(ls, i, i + 1, NULL);
00270                 }
00271             }
00272         }
00273 
00274         Py_DECREF(perm_id_str);
00275     }
00276 }
00277 
00278 /* the actual callback - not necessarily called from py */
00279 void bpy_app_generic_callback(struct Main *UNUSED(main), struct ID *id, void *arg)
00280 {
00281     PyObject *cb_list = py_cb_array[GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(arg)];
00282     if (PyList_GET_SIZE(cb_list) > 0) {
00283         PyGILState_STATE gilstate = PyGILState_Ensure();
00284 
00285         PyObject *args = PyTuple_New(1); // save python creating each call
00286         PyObject *func;
00287         PyObject *ret;
00288         Py_ssize_t pos;
00289 
00290         /* setup arguments */
00291         if (id) {
00292             PointerRNA id_ptr;
00293             RNA_id_pointer_create(id, &id_ptr);
00294             PyTuple_SET_ITEM(args, 0, pyrna_struct_CreatePyObject(&id_ptr));
00295         }
00296         else {
00297             PyTuple_SET_ITEM(args, 0, Py_None);
00298             Py_INCREF(Py_None);
00299         }
00300 
00301         /* Iterate the list and run the callbacks
00302          * note: don't store the list size since the scripts may remove themselves */
00303         for (pos = 0; pos < PyList_GET_SIZE(cb_list); pos++) {
00304             func = PyList_GET_ITEM(cb_list, pos);
00305             ret = PyObject_Call(func, args, NULL);
00306             if (ret == NULL) {
00307                 PyErr_Print();
00308                 PyErr_Clear();
00309             }
00310             else {
00311                 Py_DECREF(ret);
00312             }
00313         }
00314 
00315         Py_DECREF(args);
00316 
00317         PyGILState_Release(gilstate);
00318     }
00319 }
